title: Simulation-Based Participatory Science Teaching Methods Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of fundamental science curriculum theories and practical educational experience
context.additional_context: Simulation-based teaching methods workshop for pre-service and in-service teachers, utilizing smartphone-based simulation tools in non-PC environments

learning_goals: Learners can design smartphone-based simulations that model real scientific phenomena and propose three or more classroom application methods
Learners can develop instructional strategies that improve student engagement by over 20% through simulation activities
Learners can create rubrics to assess scientific concept comprehension by analyzing simulation result data

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
